name: Ghost Forest
description:
Your name is John.You had an car accident and you wake up in a old mental asylum and when you exit ,you found yourself in the middle of the haunted forest.You need to find your car and get away from that place.
Save yourself and don't get caught by a evil ghosts.

Feel free to use game in your videos,etc..
Post comments,tell your opinion about game.

Soon android version and update of game.
